pylapp.smoothclicker.android.receivers

Class BRScreenOff

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.receivers.BRScreenOff

  • public class BRScreenOff
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Broadcast receiver which receives broadcasts about the screen off events.
    Since:
    01/06/2016
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    pylapp
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
                      Intent intent)
        Triggered when the broadcast receiver receives the intent it is listening, i.e. an intent with the SCREEN_OFF action. It this very case the receiver will only force the screen to on.
        Parameters:
        context - -
        intent - -
